overview: With her parents away for the summer, Kelsey's house in the Hollywood Hills becomes the place for hooking up! Hot gal-pals Blake Eden and Nina North get the party started with fingers and tongues filling in each others pink boxes. Nina watches boyfriend Tyler Nixon bone Blake to an epic finish. Alex Grey and Kristen Scott explore the pool (and one another) before Kristen brings two well hung hunks over for three-way fun in the master bedroom. Six scalding scenes in all!
title: Hollywood Hills Hijinx
